title: Robin Williams
article:
Have you ever heard of Robin Williams?

Robin Williams was an all-time famous actor and comedian. He was born on July 21, 1951. For those who don’t know who he was, here are some movies he acted in that might ring a bell.

1. Mrs. Doubtfire
2. Hook
3. Jumanji
4. Flubber
5. Night at the Museum
6. Jack
7. Patch Adams

Robin was known also for being a voice actor! He knew how to make all sorts of different voices like Porky the Pig which is a Looney Tunes character alongside Bugs Bunny.Later on in his life, his comedic sense was brought to light. He appeared on an interview with Conan O’Brien.

On August 11, 2014, Robin Williams was pronounced dead with the cause of suicide. He could've committed suicide because of depression. A lot of comedians were diagnosed with depression. There is no certain reason why Robin committed suicide.
*If you want to know more about Robin Williams, you can search for him on Google or check out his page on Wikipedia!
author: Noa Kamil
